ing: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
des: "Pisco Sour is a popular drink in Chile and Peru made with Pisco and lemon juice."
ins: In a small cup, dissolve the sugar in the lemon juice. Pour the lemon juice and sugar and Pisco into a cocktail shaker. Add ice, cover and shake until the outside is frosty, about 30 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
